value.title: How to connect Windows Server to Azure hybrid services using Windows Admin Center | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Thomas Maurer joins Scott Hanselman to show how you can connect your Windows Servers on-premises to Azure hybrid services like Azure Site Recovery to protect your virtual machines or Azure Update Management to keep your servers up to date.  1:28 - Demo  Connecting Windows Server to Azure hybrid services
